Title: Relates to waiving tuition requirements for nonresident pupils whose parent works as an educational professional within the same district
Summary: Waives tuition requirements for nonresident pupils if the nonresident pupil is enrolled in a school where the pupil's parent or guardian is a principal, a teacher or a paraprofessional or the nonresident pupil is enrolled at another school within the same district as a school where the pupil's parent or guardian is a principal, a teacher or a paraprofessional.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to waiving tuition requirements for nonresident pupils whose parent works as an educational professional within the same district
